name: Game of the Century (AudreyL, Kay White, Zorphius, RollOfFate)
name_original: Game of the Century (AudreyL, Kay White, Zorphius, RollOfFate)
description:
Be the manager of GotC Studios and make decisions that will effect your studio and developers up until a sudden swap in roles... you're now a developer in the environment you created! Complete work as a programmer, artist, and designer to see the effects of crunch and play again to try to create the best working environment.

Development on Game of the Century lasted for 2 weeks as part of a rapid prototype in the month of October 2021. Made in Unity and inspired by bringing awareness to the effects of crunch.

Development Team:
Audrey Luce - Project Manager, Artist, Designer
Ethan Irwin - Tech Designer, Programmer
Kyle Walters - Programmer
Ally Rybinski - 2D & VFX Artist
Kaylie White - 3D Artist
